SEX TRAFFICKING RING.Definition: a group that transports people for sexual exploitation

MILITARY CROSS.Definition: a high medal awarded in the British army

HR DEPARTMENT.Definition: Human Resources department (the department of a company dealing with the employees)

FLOATED IT.Definition: sold shares to the public for the first time

TRIED HIS HAND.Definition: try something for the first time

TABLOID.Definition: a newspaper with small pages, mainly with sensational stories

LOATHED TO.Definition: to very strongly not want to do something

TRADE UNIONS.Definition: organisations that represent the rights of workers

BULLY.Definition: to hurt or frighten someone, often over an extended period of time

REPORTEDLY.Definition: according to what people say or think

PALES IN COMPARISON.Definition: to seem small compared to something else

PENSIONS.Definition: the money that an employee puts aside for retirement

HARD EARNED.Definition: deserved because someone has worked hard to get it

STEP UP.Definition: to take an action, even if it is not strictly required

BARON.Definition: technically a member of the nobility, but it can also mean a high-powered businessman

COVERED UP.Definition: to hide what has really happened

OVERBOARD.Definition: over the side of a boat

SCAM.Definition: an illegal way of making money, often by tricking people

A MAN OF THE PEOPLE.Definition: someone who shows understanding of and sympathy for normal people
